title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and server for running large language models locally (Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple API and Docker support.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python library.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer adding Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API with idiomatic Ruby objects.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client for Ollama written in Rust; supports chat history and themes.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedding components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container for CI pipelines and local dev.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit frontend.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings local Ollama models into any server with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Lightweight Slack bot using Bolt JS that proxies requests to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama with generate/chat/embed methods and streaming support.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds a local AI assistant sidebar powered by Ollama models.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin for local AI autocomplete, summarization, and Q&A using Ollama.
